content:
## n8n@0.97.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.96.0...n8n@0.97.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-12-10 - New nodes - Ghost - NASA - Snowflake - Twist - Enhanced nodes - Automizy: Added options to add and remove tabs for the Update operation of the Contact resource - Pipedrive: Added label field to Person, Organization, and Deal resources. Also added Update operation for the Organization resource - Bug fixes - Fixed a bug that caused OAuth1 requests to break - Fixed Docker user mount path
